title: Lets see what we can do with rehype pretty code

title: Hello World
description: I'm Christopher, Nice to Meet You!!
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const a={a:"a",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(e,{children:[n(a.h1,{id:"introduction-to-christopher-mena-software-engineer",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#introduction-to-christopher-mena-software-engineer",children:"Introduction to Christopher Mena, Software Engineer"})}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["Hello! I'm ",n(a.strong,{children:"Christopher Mena"}),", a Aspiting Software Engineer from New York City. I specialize in developing innovative solutions using a variety of programming languages and technologies."]}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"education",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#education",children:"Education"})}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["I completed my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at ",n(a.strong,{children:"Hunter College"})," in May 2023, where I engaged in extensive coursework and projects that prepared me for challenges in the tech industry.
